Module edu.citadel.cprl
Package edu.citadel.cprl.ast

Class ParameterDecl

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.AST
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.Declaration
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.ParameterDecl
All Implemented Interfaces:
NamedDecl
public class ParameterDecl
extends Declaration
implements NamedDecl
The abstract syntax tree node for a parameter declaration.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ParameterDecl​(Token paramId, Type type, boolean isVarParam)
    Construct a parameter declaration with its identifier, type, and a boolean value that indicates if it is a variable parameter declaration.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkConstraints()
    Check semantic/contextual constraints.
    int getRelAddr()
    Returns the relative address (offset) associated with this parameter declaration.
    ScopeLevel getScopeLevel()
    Returns the scope level for this declaration.
    int getSize()
    Returns the size (number of bytes) associated with this parameter declaration.
    boolean isVarParam()
    Returns true if this parameter is a variable parameter.
    void setRelAddr​(int relAddr)
    Sets the relative address for this declaration.

  • Constructor Details

    • ParameterDecl

      public ParameterDecl​(Token paramId, Type type, boolean isVarParam)
      Construct a parameter declaration with its identifier, type, and a boolean value that indicates if it is a variable parameter declaration.

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the size (number of bytes) associated with this parameter declaration. The size of a parameter declaration is the number of bytes associated with its type, except for variable parameters, whose size is the number of bytes of a memory address.
      Specified by:
      getSize in interface NamedDecl

    • getScopeLevel

      public ScopeLevel getScopeLevel()
      Description copied from interface: NamedDecl
      Returns the scope level for this declaration.
      Specified by:
      getScopeLevel in interface NamedDecl

    • setRelAddr

      public void setRelAddr​(int relAddr)
      Sets the relative address for this declaration.
      Note: This method should be called before calling method getRelAddr().
      Specified by:
      setRelAddr in interface NamedDecl

    • getRelAddr

      public int getRelAddr()
      Returns the relative address (offset) associated with this parameter declaration.
      Specified by:
      getRelAddr in interface NamedDecl

    • isVarParam

      public boolean isVarParam()
      Returns true if this parameter is a variable parameter.
